Summary: Biochemical reaction from dextrorphan to dextrorphan O-glucuronide.
Biochemical reaction from dextromethorphan to dextrorphan. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2D6 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from 3-methoxymorphinan to 3-hydroxymorphinan. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from dextrorphan to 3-hydroxymorphinan. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from dextromethorphan to 3-methoxymorphinan. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP2B6.
